mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freebie( option_fk, ss_list, fb_name, fb_type, fb_min_date, fb_max_date, fb_min_price, fb_max_price, fb_min_total_qty, fb_max_total_qty, fb_total_qty_flag, fb_another_check_flag, fb_another_check_list, fb_another_check_word, fb_another_check_type, fb_another_check_flag2, fb_another_check_list2, fb_another_check_word2, fb_another_check_type2, fb_add_type, fb_add_qty, fb_add_multi_qty, fb_update, fb_regdate, fb_reg_type ) VALUES( #{optionFk}, #{ssList}, #{fbName}, #{fbType}, #{fbMinDate}, #{fbMaxDate}, #{fbMinPrice}, #{fbMaxPrice}, #{fbMinTotalQty}, #{fbMaxTotalQty}, #{fbTotalQtyFlag}, #{fbAnotherCheckFlag}, #{fbAnotherCheckList}, #{fbAnotherCheckWord}, #{fbAnotherCheckType}, #{fbAnotherCheckFlag2}, #{fbAnotherCheckList2}, #{fbAnotherCheckWord2}, #{fbAnotherCheckType2}, #{fbAddType}, #{fbAddQty}, #{fbAddMultiQty}, NOW(), NOW(), #{fbRegType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE freebie SET ss_list = #{ssList}, option_fk = #{optionFk}, fb_name = #{fbName}, fb_type = #{fbType}, fb_min_date = #{fbMinDate}, fb_max_date = #{fbMaxDate}, fb_min_price = #{fbMinPrice}, fb_max_price = #{fbMaxPrice}, fb_min_total_qty = #{fbMinTotalQty}, fb_max_total_qty = #{fbMaxTotalQty}, fb_total_qty_flag = #{fbTotalQtyFlag}, fb_another_check_flag = #{fbAnotherCheckFlag}, fb_another_check_list = #{fbAnotherCheckList}, fb_another_check_word = #{fbAnotherCheckWord}, fb_another_check_type = #{fbAnotherCheckType}, fb_another_check_flag2 = #{fbAnotherCheckFlag2}, fb_another_check_list2 = #{fbAnotherCheckList2}, fb_another_check_word2 = #{fbAnotherCheckWord2}, fb_another_check_type2 = #{fbAnotherCheckType2}, fb_add_type = #{fbAddType}, fb_add_qty = #{fbAddQty}, fb_add_multi_qty = #{fbAddMultiQty}, fb_update = NOW(), fb_reg_type = #{fbRegType} WHERE fb_pk = #{fbPk}
mapper.select: SELECT fb.*, op.option_name, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name, fc.* FROM freebie fb INNER JOIN options op ON fb.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk LEFT JOIN freebie_check fc ON fc.fb_fk = fb.fb_pk

SELECT fb.*, op.option_name, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name FROM freebie fb INNER JOIN options op ON fb.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk ORDER BY fb.fb_pk DESC LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(inne.fb_pk) FROM ( SELECT fb.*, op.option_name, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name FROM freebie fb INNER JOIN options op ON fb.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk ) inne

SELECT fb.*, op.option_name, pro.product_pk, pro.product_name FROM freebie fb INNER JOIN options op ON fb.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON op.product_fk = pro.product_pk WHERE fb_pk = #{fbPk}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freebie_check( fb_fk, fc_order_target, fc_type ) VALUES( #{fbFk}, #{fcOrderTarget}, #{fcType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ori_od.or_pk) AS or_pk, SUM(ori_od.or_amount) AS or_amount, SUM(ori_od.or_total_price) AS or_total_price,
if( #{fbType} = 0, ori_od.or_serial_special_number, IF( #{fbType} = 1, ori_od.or_order_number, IF( #{fbType} = 2, ori_od.or_receiver_contract_number1, ori_od.or_buyer_contract_number1 ) ) ) AS ss_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ori_od.or_serial_special_number,',') AS or_serial_special_number, ori_od.or_buyer_id, ori_od.or_buyer_name, ori_od.or_buyer_another_name, ori_od.or_buyer_contract_number1, ori_od.or_buyer_contract_number2, ori_od.or_receiver_name, ori_od.or_delivery_type, ori_od.or_payment_position_type, ori_od.or_sending_deadline, ori_od.or_delivery_charge_type, ori_od.or_delivery_number, ori_od.or_delivery_discount_price, ori_od.or_receiver_contract_number1, ori_od.or_receiver_contract_number2, ori_od.or_shipping_address_number, ori_od.or_shipping_address, ori_od.or_shipping_address_detail, ori_od.or_special_region_flag, ori_od.or_sending_address, ori_od.or_payment_type, ori_od.ss_fk, ori_od.or_delivery_charge_payment_type, ori_od.or_delivery_special_price, ori_od.or_output_date, ori_od.or_output_flag, ori_od.or_output_posib_flag, ori_od.or_regdate, ori_od.or_special_region_check_flag FROM orders ori_od INNER JOIN ( SELECT INNE.or_pk FROM ( SELECT od.or_pk, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_product_number, pro.product_name, op.option_name, od.or_shipping_address, od.or_user_column1, od.or_user_column2, od.or_user_column3 FROM orders od INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE
${fbRegType} >= #{fbMinDate} AND ${fbRegType} < #{fbMaxDate} AND od.or_devide_flag = 0 AND od.or_output_flag = 0 AND (od.or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR od.or_delivery_invoice_number = '' ) AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL AND od.or_product_order_number NOT LIKE '사은품%'
AND od.ss_fk IN
#{storeList}
AND (
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
= #{item}
)
) INNE
WHERE (
INNE.or_product
INNE.or_product_option
INNE.or_product_number
INNE.product_name
INNE.option_name
INNE.or_shipping_address
INNE.or_user_column1
INNE.or_user_column2
INNE.or_user_column3
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fbAnotherCheckWord2},'%')
INNE.or_product
INNE.or_product_option
INNE.or_product_number
INNE.product_name
INNE.option_name
INNE.or_shipping_address
INNE.or_user_column1
INNE.or_user_column2
INNE.or_user_column3
= #{fbAnotherCheckWord2}
)
GROUP BY INNE.or_pk ) inner_od ON ori_od.or_pk = inner_od.or_pk
ori_od.or_pk > 0
AND ori_od.or_pk NOT IN ( SELECT od.or_pk FROM orders od INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE
${fbRegType} >= #{fbMinDate} AND ${fbRegType} < #{fbMaxDate} AND od.or_devide_flag = 0 AND od.or_output_flag = 0 AND (od.or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR od.or_delivery_invoice_number = '' ) AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.ss_fk IN
#{storeList}
AND (
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
= #{item}
) GROUP BY od.or_pk )
AND ori_od.or_pk NOT IN ( SELECT od.or_pk FROM orders od INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE
${fbRegType} >= #{fbMinDate} AND ${fbRegType} < #{fbMaxDate} AND od.or_devide_flag = 0 AND od.or_output_flag = 0 AND (od.or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR od.or_delivery_invoice_number = '' ) AND od.or_sending_day IS NULL
AND od.ss_fk IN
#{storeList}
AND (
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fbAnotherCheckWord2},'%')
od.or_product
od.or_product_option
od.or_product_number
pro.product_name
op.option_name
od.or_shipping_address
od.or_user_column1
od.or_user_column2
od.or_user_column3
= #{fbAnotherCheckWord2}
) GROUP BY od.or_pk )
GROUP BY ss_name, ori_od.or_buyer_id, ori_od.or_buyer_name, ori_od.or_buyer_another_name, ori_od.or_buyer_contract_number1, ori_od.or_buyer_contract_number2, ori_od.or_receiver_name, ori_od.or_delivery_type, ori_od.or_payment_position_type, ori_od.or_sending_deadline, ori_od.or_delivery_charge_type, ori_od.or_delivery_number, ori_od.or_delivery_discount_price, ori_od.or_receiver_contract_number1, ori_od.or_receiver_contract_number2, ori_od.or_shipping_address_number, ori_od.or_shipping_address, ori_od.or_shipping_address_detail, ori_od.or_special_region_flag, ori_od.or_sending_address, ori_od.or_payment_type, ori_od.ss_fk, ori_od.or_delivery_charge_payment_type, ori_od.or_delivery_special_price, ori_od.or_output_date, ori_od.or_output_flag, ori_od.or_output_posib_flag, ori_od.or_regdate, ori_od.or_special_region_check_flag
or_total_price >= #{fbMinPrice} AND or_total_price <= #{fbMaxPrice}
AND or_amount >= #{fbMinTotalQty} AND or_amount <= #{fbMaxTotalQty}
or_total_price >= #{fbMinPrice}
AND or_amount >= #{fbMinTotalQty}
AND ss_name NOT IN
#{item.fcOrderTarget}
